name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Motivational Quotes with Image in New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspirational and Motivational Quotes with Image random when you open new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New Tab page gives you a moment of calm and inspires you to be more productive,  get inspired with a photo and quote. 

Replace new tab page with a Inspirational and Motivational Quotes with Image random when you open new tab.

The new version will have:
- Stop/ Pause: Keep the quotes.
- Change the random when you open new tab to change about X time.
